summary: Finally, a place to put Wuuthrad after you\'ve finished the Companions\' quest line.
descriptionHtml:
After completing the Companions\' quest line, I was disappointed that there was no place to put Wuuthrad after I was done. And since leaving it on that statue at Ysgramor\'s Tomb is out of the question (it just falls off, later), I decided to make this simple little addition.  Now there\'s a plaque down in the Harbinger\'s Quarters of Jorrvaskr where Wuuthrad can be placed.

One small bug I should mention, though.  For some reason, anything that is put on this plaque can\'t be removed.  However, since I never planned to lug Wuuthrad around, anyway, I just accepted it.  However, if anyone can tell me how to fix this, I\'d really appreciate it and I\'ll fix it.

Enjoy.
author: CaptainRC
